greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Primes of the form primorial P(k)*2^n-1 with minimal n, n>=0, k>=2.
comment: Conjecture: sequence is defined for all k>=2
mathematica: nmax = 2^2048; npd = 2; n = 2; npd = npd*Prime[n]; While[npd < nmax, tt = 1; cp = npd*tt - 1; While[ ! (PrimeQ[cp]), tt = tt*2; cp = npd*tt - 1]; Print[cp]; n = n + 1; npd = npd*Prime[n]]
results.author: _Lei Zhou_, Feb 15 2005
